title: mcmmo
author: Inogny
txt_content: mcmmo最新版，怎么配置钓鱼技能

replies.author: AkkLive
replies.txt_content:
config里面改

    Fishing:
        Level_Cap: 0
        Drops_Enabled: true
        Override_Vanilla_Treasures: false
        # Always catch fish, even when treasure is found
        Extra_Fish: false
        Lure_Modifier: 4.0

复制即可 可使用钓鱼有效果

replies.author: Inogny
replies.txt_content:

config里面改

config里面并没有flshing
